reviews.review_text: I didn t use to be a huge fan of chicken and especially fried, but I ve heard very good things about Downlow Chicken Shack so I decided to give it a shot. It s one of the BEST (if not the best) spot in town for chicken. Generous portions, great combination of flavors and very very friendly stuff. I freaking loved it! In terms of the actual restaurant, it s not anything extraordinary but more of like a grab and go place, with a few stands if you wanna dine in. Nothing wrong with it tho, will definitely visit again soon!

Serves Nashville burgers and fries for your fried food cravings. Went there with my friends and had a great time and food. Located in Commercial Drive, this is a happening place in town. They have different levels of spice and the waitresses are cooperative and courteous. Recommended: OG Chicken Sandwich and Fries.

This fried chicken shack ruined other fried chicken for me forever!!!!! Yes it s hard to find parking, minimal seating, sometimes lengthy waits, expensive (compared to what though? It s Vancouver) but it s so worth it. The fried chicken is always juicy and perfecy seasoned, the skin is so crispy. The pickles are seasoned too and it s so good. If you just get chicken to go, they ll put it on bread to absorb the oil which is genius. The crinkle cut fries are delicious and I like to alternate between ketchup and DL sauce. Because of the price, this is more of a big scheduled treat than a convenient stop for me but I look forward to it!

This is a  best-seller Chicken place . It s located along Commercial Drive corner of Venables Street. We got the OG Sando Combo (with in-house coleslaw & sauce), crispy chicken skin, french fries (with special sauce) side dishes, and handmade Lemonade. The chicken is juicy, tender, and very flavourful - the best chicken sandwich I have ever tasted. The fries have a special spice craveable to the palate.  Their in-house DL sauce is super yummy. Both the sandwich and fries are huge portions. Staffs are friendly, service is excellent. Limited indoor/outdoor seating space. Be ready for a long queue.   Street parking can be a challenge. Will definitely be back. Try Downlow Chicken Shack, you can t go wrong.

Prepare to get your hands dirty and bring your appetite! That was one juicy piece of chicken between them buns. Was recommended Rookie of the Year OG with chimichurri sauce. Really enjoyed the seasoning on the fries. Also, their House Lemonade was refreshing! Great customer service, and be sure to let them know if its your 1st time! Street parking available. There is not a lot of seating, but people seemed respectful and did not linger after they ate. Please build a 3rd location in Coquitlam next.

You are in Vancouver: GO THERE! We went during our short stay in Vancouver and it was a great experience. We went as a family and got a great applause from the whole team as were first-timers. So nice! Even if you are hungry as we were, dont order too much at a time. The boxes are fully packed with great delicious food!

The best food with the best service love the funny welcoming staff. Make sure to tell them its youe first time, you get a surprise. Chicken is massive in any sandwich extremely generous portions with deep rich flavor. Love it all highly recommend.
The best crispy chicken, i have tried DL fries after reading lot of good reviews, its worth trying. Its not great place for dine in but the taste is amazing.

This is one of the greatest fast food places I have ever visited. From the food, to the service, to the atmosphere, its all wonderful. Its incredibly unique and the chicken is perfect. I highly recommend visiting this place for a meal as it will be well worth your time.

Hit it   ! This is a must spot for chicken. So many yummy things that is great for sharing with friends. Sit at the picnic tables on location or walk up to a park. Grab a handful of sauce or maybe try a real spicy one.

Chicken either in the sandwich or the one served separately is perfectly cooked and flavored. Sandwich comes with their in-house coleslaw, sauce, and the bun tends to hold them pretty well along with the big chicken piece. I had the lemon pepper sandwich, which can be served with either a breast or leg meat, and it was not too hot. I tried the jerk chicken with the fries, and it was hot but very good, though. The size of the sandwich is good, and it would suggest getting the fries only if a couple of people are willing to share them. They have a small seating in the restaurant and outside, and I would suggest to try having the food over there as the food might suffer if you try to hold it for long (carry-out). Vegetarian options: Its a chicken shack, and the only vegetarian option is the fries.
Delicious and juicy fried chicken with many level of spicy. Friendly staff with good atmosphere but little place to sit and eat.
Downlow is delicious! The only negative is the price. The value is okay at best. Assume to pay just over $20 for each person. The food is very good and well seasoned.

Just. Like. The. Photos. Finding me wearing my DL snapback because Downlow Chicken Shack lives up to all the hype. Id wager its the best fried chicken sandwich in Vancouver, and certainly the best Id ever had. Ive been going to DL for a long time and typically order the Jerk Chicken Sando. Its not a true Jamaican jerk style but its still off the charts amazing. Recommended sides are the coleslaw and the mac salad. They do unreal chicken thighs as well. I dont know where they get these chicken breasts/ thighs from but they are extremely juicy and tasty. Super high quality and Ive always been impressed with the passion these guys put into serving fried chicken. Im a huge fan, and will continue to hit this place up whenever I can.

Downlow Chicken Shack probably holds the best chicken sandwich Ive had so far! I went for The Lemon Pepper and it was amazing! The pickled red onions and jalapeno honey mayo definitely completes the sandwich! They give you an option of breast meat or leg meat for the chicken and thats a great feature. We also got the tenders and fries with some DL sauce and it was pretty good! The fries were pretty flavorful. Their original tenders are pretty good by themselves too. Would DEFINITELY come back to this place if I ever visit van again.
Good place for American style chicken with thick crunchy batter. Portion size is generous and sauces are good. Honestly the 4 sides were killer, especially the max and cheese!

We ordered the OG sandwich, 2 pieces and fries. The food was sooo good as the chicken was soft, flavourful and has nice herb fragrance. 2 pieces come with honey bread in the bottom and tasty pickle. We seriously prefer this over any other chicken fast food out there. It s a must try. The white dipping sauce is also amazing. It s a bit of a mess when eating the sandwich tho but soooo worth it it was really good that we forgot to take the photo before taking the first bite.

Been here more than a few times and always have a great experience from the staff to the food. I ordered the large tender combo and as usual it was great. I ve had Hattie B s in Nashville and this is just as good. They also gave me 3 sauces for the tenders which was perfect. Couldn t had a other one but I like sauce with my tenders. They re own DL sauce is incredible

After waiting in a long line, I finally ordered the OG chicken sando combo with fries and both come with super hot spicy level. It actually was really spicy not a Tobasco-level spicy but scorching spicy which I personally like. The chicken is crispy and halal. I asked the staff and they said they cooked it separately from bacon. I wish they gave more slaw on it but it s something that I ll come and try again.

Fried Chicken at it s finest Been wanting to go here for a long while.  Today was the day!  Messy, sloppy, enormous, crowded.  Good music.  Excellent staff.  A heartfelt welcome from the team! Really good.  Not really a good place for a first date  .  You don t really need a side dish.

Go right now, then take all your friends. Seriously the best fried chicken I ve had in Vancouver. Can be hard to get a seat inside but there is outdoor seating. Ask for the Waffle Slider (off menu item $18)
The portion of side fries is huge. The thigh tastes good. I like the mild spice which makes a taste a little bit elevated. I tried UBC one but like this at Commercial Drive more.

Been to this restaurant three times for lunch, late lunch and dinner and each time the food has been excellent. It is certainly one of those places in Vancouver that you want to take your tourist friends to

Went here for the first time and the hype is well deserved. Probably the best chicken burger Ive ever had. The service was very quick and attentive as well. Will definitely be back to try other menu items.

For the past two years, weve been loyal customers of this place. Its our go-to spot for the most delicious fried chicken around. Their original and jerk spicy sando burgers are top-notch, and if you pair them with fries on the low, its pure perfection. Were such fans of their food that we never even have time to snap pictures   we dive right in as soon as our order arrives!

August 20, 2022 Best bomb fried chicken that the city has to offer. Chicken is great, service was excellent; it seemed like all the staff enjoyed working there. Ive got the OG Sando (Breast) w/side of hot fries. We ended up sitting on some greasy graffitied park bench made of plastic. It was a very East Vancouver experience. I could only recommend Downlow for takeout, to enjoy in a messy fashion in the comfort of your home. Parking: Try your luck with street-side parking
First experience was great. Sandwich was massive. Delicious. And messy in all the best ways. Fries had a nice seasoning. I am going to recommend this to all my friends traveling through Vancouver.
Best fried chicken sandwich you can get. Ranch is good but the original is the best sandwich you can get.

So good. Went on a Tuesday afternoon, no line up at all. However, I hear it can be busy and you should expect to wait in line. Ordered the original Sando with the Mac salad. Can choose between white or brown meat. I chose thunder as my heat level, honestly wasn t spicy more Peppery than anything. Portions are decent size but not too much. Fries are also really good.

Ive been coming to down low chicken for so long yet Im only getting to a review now. Every other time I came the food was annihilated before I had time to take a picture!  Firstly, the chicken is crispy and juicy, perfectly fried. The pickles are different here, I usually hate pickles but I loved these, the flavor left a nice refreshing taste after the bite of fried chicken! The fries on the down low are super worth the upgrade they add pickles, pickled onion, coleslaw, sauce and chicken to the fries. Its super addicting. Come in hungry and order up and you wont be disappointed!

We finally decided to brave the line-up and check out Downlow Chicken Shack.  We had the two by four combo, the original and the rookie sando.  The fried chicken was very tender and the sauces and spices were very complimentary with the sandwich.  As a personal preference, next time, I will ask for half the amount of the spices because it was a bit too much flavour.  All in all, it was excellent food and service and definitely worth the wait.  We will be back!

Awesome, friendly and energetic staff. You can truly tell how hard they work. Don t forget to check them out on Wing Wednesday. Their wings are so delicious. Also comes with pickles that are super tasty! Best fried chicken sandwich I ve ever had! Food : 5/5

I ve been here twice now and I LOVE IT!  Great yummy chicken made fresh right away. You can choose the hotness level and a choice of sauce to go with it. The line is normally always pretty long but it goes by pretty quickly. All the employees are very friendly and always have a smile on their face! The parking can be a bit difficult because it s only pay street parking. So give yourself time. Aswell it is easy to drive past as it s a bit hidden away on the corner. But If you love chicken I would highly recommend you check this place out !

First time visit and wasnt disappointed. Super busy when we arrived but the staff are like machines and quickly got our order served. The chicken was delicious and the size of pieces was huge. The sides were huge too. Staff are friendly. Place is small if you are thinking about eating in.

One of Vancouvers best places to eat. If you know, you know. Ive always received amazing customer service and the food is consistently amazing and high quality. Its probably a good thing I live so far away, otherwise I would go almost every day! Parking: Dont bother trying to find parking on Commercial Drive, look on one of the side streets.

Best fried chicken in Vancouver! I m a huge fan of fried chicken so I had to go opening weekend. Long line (as to be expected in this foody city of ours) but they efficiently sped everyone through. I got hot and  side of milk  hot. Very tasty, very crispy. The fries were cooked perfectly and it s some of the best cornbread I ve ever had. I wish I grabbed two slices. I didn t like how the chicken came with pickles around it. I ll just be saying pickles on the side next time. If you like spicy and fried chicken this place is the bomb! Good beats to nod your head at through your meal too! Manager is very nice, helpful and friendly.

Delicious chicken sandwich with layers of flavor and satisfying chicken. Suggestions for ordering: ask for light sauce as Ive gotten too much sauce both times Ive ordered and it causes the bun to get soggy almost immediately. Also skip the fries unless youre sharing as the chicken sandwich is very large and filling. Fries are pretty good, although not as good as waffle fries from Frying Pan.

This place is amazing. The people, the food, the spice the chicken - they nailed it all. I will be visiting this place every other day until I have tried everything on their menu. A chicken lovers paradise. Tenders: I have had the extra hot and the hot and both are perfect. The skin is crispy and hot, the chicken more so. These dip offered balances the spice nicely and adds a fresh note to a very savory affair. I have had them twice, with crinkle fries. The fires could maybe do with some more seasoning but they are very crispy. OG sando and the jerk sando: OG was amazing, the chicken was tender, juicy and perfectly seasoned. The sauce used in the sandwich complemented the chicken very well. The chicken piece inside was a bit large for a sandwich that size making it difficult to manage it with one hand but that is just a personal preference. I did not like the Jerk Sando, the chicken was dry for my taste. It was nicely seasoned too but the chicken felt too dry and chewy making it an unpleasant experience. It is entirely possible that I got one bad sandwich and Jerk Sando is pretty good but I will only be able to confirm once I try it again.
Go to again for sure. Excellent chicken!!! First time here. Chicken was  crunchy, juicy, and flavourful. Staff treated me really well. Order the Piled High and see what happens.

Downlow Chicken has forever changed how I view and rate a chicken sandwich. From the crispy tender and spicy (depending on what you want), hand prepared chicken breast to the perfectly balanced coleslaw and pickle toppings, every bite is a pure joy and a fantastic experience. Ive always heard tall tales and stories of this legendary place and sandwich, but there was always a fear in the back of my mind that it would be like meeting one of your childhood heros to find out they did not add up to my imagination amd hopes. Well my friends, I can tell you that not only did it meet the expectations of my imagination. It exceeded them! This piece of delicious art has the power to turn vegans into a diehard regulars. Thank you for giving me yet another thing in life to hold on to, and look forward to.
Most unique tasting burger Ive had to date. Although Ive had a variety of burgers all over Canada this had to be the best  Ive had in a long time! If youre in the city, this is a must try!!!

This place is honestly to die for. I usually dine in but today I got take out during work and it was just as amazing. Definitely god sent, every ingredient in this burger makes it unforgettable. I can t think of a better chicken place! Also their customer service is above and beyond amazing. All their staff are so kind and put the customer first. Nothing but the best things to say about them!!
Simply delicious fried chicken with huge portions. They don t skip on the fries at all. Definitely need to try if you haven t yet. Gotta come back and try the rest of the menu
Place has got some great chicken at reasonable prices. Might be tough to get a seat, especially if its rainy. Chicken can be mild or very spicy. Atmosphere feels right at home on commercial.

The fried chicken is Crounchy! Yes Crounchy! Its like an elevated level of crunch! So damn good! Probably one of the best fried chicken sandwiches I have had. I make a point to always find a fried chicken spot or a fried chicken sandwich place and Im glad I found this one! Staff were nice, one of the guys running the line came up to each of the customers and asked how the food was and had a little chat with everyone which was a nice touch to the whole experience. We ordered the original fried chicken sandwich with the thunder heat and it was fantastic. I actually want to try the hotter options because the thunder was a nice spice but I always look for a little bit more heat. We also ordered the Cool Ranch dusted fried chicken sando and it was delicious. There is very minimal inside and outside sitting so just be aware of that. I didnt get a chance to snap a photo of the other options they provide but there is probably something for everyone. Including a few different sides to add to your fried chicken sando or just fried chicken. If you have 30 mins to an hour you should definitely take the time to check out this spot. Definitely hits the spot! If we come back to Vancouver we will definitely be returning!

Is it a hidden gem? Or maybe I m out of touch. These are the best chicken thighs I have ever eaten. I like that it serves with pickles, but I m not a big fan of the bread, maybe it s for absorbing all the chicken goodness at the bottom, I just saved them for my wife, I saved her a piece of chicken too, so I m not a total jerk. LOL.

In search of the finest fried chicken in Vancouver you will hear about the top spot on commercial drive in the city (which is endorsed by James aka Eze-Extractor.) With one of the most famous menus around has people lining up since their inception on commercial drive adding to the famous destination known as the Drive. Hot is an understatement if you enjoy a spicy meal with a wide range of heat levels with a couple even off menu their so hot!!!!, With collaborating with so many other restaurants and brands within the city keeps their menu rank top above all. Thank you for you and see you guys soon

Delicious fried chicken without bones and a spice level that will make you weep out of pleasure and flavors, Download has alot of hype and seems to live up to it.  Come for good chicken, fried to perfection.   Avoid because of the lines and cramp space.

Easy parking around commercial drive. Restaurant is not big but has outdoor seating as well. Staff are super nice and very good service Playing some good music Food is really good. Not your ordinary chicken. The chicken burger is really good. They really use some quality chicken as mentioned already. If you like your food spicy opt for the  Hot  version of Chicken Burger Fries are really delicious with some in-house DL sauce and mix spices they use. A must try for chicken lovers!

The portion is so big that the leftover is enough for me for another meal. There was line up but moved quickly and I didn t have to wait long for my order. The sandwiches were huge and I got very messy trying bite those, good thing I got them to go and ate at home. Very friendly and efficient service.

The carnivore order was so heavy, dirty, greasy, and flavorful in its best way. Loved how well they dry the chicken and still made the breast so juicy!! Just check out how orange the sunny side up is oh my lord

Probably one of the best spicy fried chicken sandwiches in Vancouver. The fries are crispy and have a tasty seasoning. Also ordered the Down Low fries which is a perfect amount to share between two people. I tried the Needs a side of milk spice and it wasnt that bad so now I have to return and try the secret menu spice level Reaper.
Yummy! Chicken was juicy and crunchy. Fries were flavoured well and crispy. Online order was easy to use and convenient.

Can t really place my finger on what made this such a great meal - but the juicy chicken thighs and the exciting spice scale (ranging from mild to extreme spice) were definitely part of it. Fries were super generous and came with a nice smokey cajun-esque coat. Price isn t cheap for about $16 post tax for a 2-piece combo (without drink) but it s worth the visit to commercial drive for sure!

First timers have all the fun! This food (I had the waffle and chicken combo) blew my mind. Ive never had flavors and textures like that before. Would definitely go here again. Our friends told us to go here, and Im so glad we did!
I walked into the crew rapping J Coles verse from Johnny Ps caddy in unison. 10/10 for ambiance and food. Halal btw.
One of the best chicken places in Vancouver. Make sure you ask for lots of napkins. Very saucy and juicy

Loved it!! If youre looking for some comfort style food, this is it. The boneless chicken was juicy, crispy, and packed with flavour. The spice levels that they provide are spot on. We ordered hot and extra hot. It had really good heat to it. The chicken and waffles were amazing! Definitely worth coming back for. The line to order was long, but it didnt take too long to receive our food. They were very busy, but for good reason. Its worth the wait. The staff were very friendly and efficient. Bravo team!

Absolutely terrific fried chicken! This is - hands down - the best chicken joint in the Greater Vancouver Area. The prices are fair, the portions are plentiful, and the food is extremely flavourful and delicious. The staff are friendly and the service is quick. If you love  Southern  style food or fried chicken, check out this restaurant. Highly recommended, especially for groups. You can also customize your heat level.

Came here on wing Wednesday. Expect a bit of a line up. The service was on point. Food arrived hot and perfectly seasoned. The music is just a little bit too loud so its a little hard to have a conversation. Ample parking in the front. Staff members are welcoming and professional.

Line moved super fast and we waited maybe 10 minutes for our food. Chicken was well-seasoned as well as crisp and juicy. I had the original sandwich with medium spice and I felt it was a nice level of heat (definitely want to try the hot next time!). The coleslaw, pickles and mayo really balances out the spice. Portion is really big and not too horribly priced for a local joint. Can t wait to revisit.

Currently this place is offering take out only. It was my first time getting around to trying this place and it lived up to the hype. I got the boneless chicken thigh and 5.chicken tenders. You can control the amount of heat dry spice they add on top. The meat.is served fresh and crispy. I thought it was unusual that our orders were served on a plain slice of white bread. I enjoyed the chicken on its own. Ill be back to try out more items on the menu!

Had my first crispy chicken sammich and now Im a convert. I got the original with bacon and cheese at lunch. Id give it more stars if I had it warm. Instead took impromptu zoom meeting for 30 min...and then went to town. The lines are busy here, but the chicken is well well worth it!
Best Fried Chicken Ive Ever Had! Seasoned and cooked perfectly everytime! I recommend the Chicken (boneless thighs) and Waffles (cheese and onion) w the Honey Jalapeno Mayo. Delicious  . 10/10

Incredible food and service.  I tried a wing and the meat fell off the bone.  Perfectly cooked chicken.  I showed up 30mins+ before they opened at 11.  This isnt necessary just it was a beautiful day and I was the first one there. When the line up started closer to opening I was behind a few people and a staff member noticed I was waiting and offered to put me at the front of the line.  I declined but it really shows how much they care about their business and customers.  If I listed all the things this place did right it go on forever. Downsides are the Hot wasnt spicy but I eat spicy foods so take that with a grain of salt.  I think for any real spice youll need to try Extra hot or side of milk Didnt try either this time though.  They didnt have any sweet tea prepared when they opened and their supplier shorted them on their lemonade but stuff like that happens.  Their mac salad is good but wished it was southern mac and cheese instead which would be perfect with hot chicken. Lotta places pop up and you hear about the hype and wonder if its worth the time and effort.  Often it is not worth it.  This isnt one of those places.   My commute there was an hour and it was worth it.

Incredible chicken spot DO NOT SKIP OUT ON THIS PLACE. Massive portions, massive flavour, and everything else you could possibly dream of when looking for some top tier fried chicken. Careful on the spice if that s not your jam.

Crazy good! Tasty jerk chicken. Crisp fries with an amazing spice on them.  The same with the mac salad.....unique! Never tasted anything like it.  Loved it all. Quick and energetic service and amazing food.

By far the best chicken sandwich Ive ever had in my life! Ive been trying to think if Ive ever had a single food item better than their chicken sandwich, and I dont think I can think of anything thats even been close...! The fries are also incredible, seasoned well, and when dipped in the DL sauce..  I was visiting from Victoria and this place was recommended by a friend, so glad I went. Honestly Id be willing to come back to Vancouver if this place was my only stop.

the chicken sandwich and tenders were great.  I ordered extra hot for the sandwiches and it was a perfect taste and not to spicy. I then ordered three jerk tenders and one reaper. I think you could have done better, I only made it through all of it, then suddenly felt the burn. After downing my red bull and a few cups of water I was able to cool down.   the air conditioner and my shirt being soaked in sweat from the lava stick i just ate helped as well. After washing my face I realized I didnt wash my hands, then IT hit me ; I just maced myself.   Amazing experience I WILL BE BACK Thank you

Such a great fried chicken place. It makes an argument for best in Vancouver for sure. I recommend the sandos, specifically the jerk chicken for spice and the truffle for just deliciousness. Lovely humans running the spot as well! Get the ginger beer as well!

I had the Cannibal Lector with the chicken skin and fried egg, it was by far the best fried chicken Ive had in my life. They dont do delivery at all, but let me say that its worth the trip to go pick up. I would recommend calling in your order first so you can avoid the long order line. 100% would recommend to any fried chicken lover.
Juicy delicious fried chicken sandwiches. You can choose between white or dark meat. Portions of chicken are huge and might even fall out of your burger. Be prepared to wait in line!

I ordered 2 boneless chicken thighs, medium spice, with an add-on of chicken skin.  The dry spice mix is quite heavy, but thats a good thing because it really gives it a flavourful kick.  I can honestly say that this is the best fried chicken Ive ever had in the lower mainland. I went on a soaking wet Tuesday afternoon at 2pm during the middle of the 2nd wave of Covid, and it was lined up.  I had to wait for about 6 orders ahead of me (thankfully they have ample room on their covered patio to wait for my order) but it was all worth it.  Definitely go here...now!  Stop thinking about it.  I said go!  What the hell, youre still waiting? Whats wrong with you?!
This place does the best fried chicken Ive ever had. Easy online ordering and pickup process. Lots of options and flavors. Great sauces. Theyve got it all. Just wish I lived closer. Food : 5/5

The chicken shack was actually one of the best burgers I ve ever had in my whole life. The light chicken burger was perfectly cooked and although it was white meat it was still so juicy. The dark meat sandwich was also delicious but kind of sloppy. They had a huge lineup that went down the alley but it was definitely worth the wait. This place is a must try, best chicken sandwich I ve ever had hands-down. They use halal chicken, however the bacon is pork.

Absolutely delicious food! The staff is amazing and went above and beyond to make sure my kids and I had a great experience. If youve never been there I highly recommend you give it a try cause you definitely wont regret it!

Best damn friend chicken in the city. The line was out the door and had to wait for food, about 20 minutes total, but so worth the wait. The chicken was juicy, crunchy and delicious! So fresh, made to order and excellent quality. I got the chicken sandwich Classic style and it was the best damn chicken sandwich Ive ever had, and just on my spice tolerance (which is very low). I had bite of my kids mild and it was too spicy for me. So, if you have no/low spice tolerance I suggest going with the Classic, which has no spice. If youre planning on checking it out go early and be prepared to wait. Youll be glad you did.

This is one of the best places in the metro Vancouver area to get fried chicken. The staff is great, the food is fresh, and has a very hip atmosphere. Make sure to follow them on social media to see secret menu items.

The MUST visit restaurant for chicken I cannot rave about this place enough! Doug, the owner, has curated something of magnificence. My sandwich of choice is the Hannibal Lecter, but I don t think you can go wrong with whatever you decide. Their chicken is super moist and tastes so delicious. Come with your appetite though because the portion size is big! I usually grab a side of fries, but can barely make it through the sandwich most times. There s a reason they re winning awards throughout the city, go give them a try
Great food! Kind workers even when theyre busy. Def recommended! Their lil chicken bites are my fav as they have a really great crunch to them. Love it! Will go again
Delicious- love that they have dairy free option for chicken ( they dredge chicken in brine and not buttermilk) service was so welcoming and helpful

Finally was able to make it to Downlow and it was great! Got the chicken and waffles; it was the best chicken and waffles Ive ever had. The cheddar and scallion waffle was perfect with their boneless thighs and topped with jalapeno honey mayo and their pickles. Seriously addictive! Also, the chicken skin icecream sando collaboration with Mister was just perfection.

Some of the best fried chicken in BC. Great Seasonings and sides. You can usually find this place due to the lineup out the front door. Ordered the classic and added the fried chicken skin, should have gone all the way and ordered the Cannibal Lector, but no regrets, Ill be back. My buddy Spicoli ordered the tenders, some drumsticks, mac salad, slaw, and a side of pickles. All the sides we had were spot on. Felt like I was visiting a chicken shack in Louisiana. The drumsticks are available on Tuesdays for $2 each! Wowzers Dowzers! If you have a craving for some fried chicky, hit this place up

There are no words to describe just how amazing this place is. Yeah, there is a line up but it is absolutely worth the wait. I had the original chicken sando and a tenders.. Amazing..seriously this food could bring word peace. The staff are super friendly and gave great recommendations for sides and dipping sauces. All around a great experience and Ill be going again and again. 10/10 my new favorite place.

What a place! The staff are bright and friendly as if the food. Ordering off the secret menu, the cannibal consists of a fluffy brioche bun, a thick chicken piece either dark meat or light meat deep fried to crunchy goldeness, coated in their spice depending on how spicy you like it. Fried chicken skin and topped with a fried egg. Unbelievably juicy moist chicken. To top it off, the crinkle cut fries drizzled with their sauce makes for a perfect meal.

Honestly the BEST chicken shack I ve ever been to. Always looking forward to the next time I go, and have never been disappointed. The management is incredibly nice and the staff are all genuinely excited to be there which makes the experience much more enjoyable. I ve recommend Downlow Chicken Shack to all of my friends and they have all been blow away with the quality of both the service and the taste of the food. Keep up the amazing work!

The best quick-service restaurant in Vancouver, and the best chicken sandwich I ve ever had. I m a big fried chicken guy, and DownLow is king. Here s why: Light bun that doesn t overpower the other parts of the sandwich Slaw and pickles that add both sweetness and texture Moist chicken that s incredibly crispy all the way through, even in the middle of the bun Customizable spice level that even at its spiciest allows you to enjoy the other elements of the sandwich I cannot recommend this place enough. It will change your life. Always ask for dark meat. Every morning I wake up and pray to the effigy of Doug Stephen in my living room    , and spend 10 minutes of meditation thinking of fries on the DownLow   . A must-try in Vancouver.
This is the best fried chicken in the world. No Cap

Without exaggeration, this place has one of the best fried chicken sandwiches Ive ever had. I tried the Original sando, and I have to say that it blew me away. The chicken is well-seasoned and delicious, spicy, super juicy, and once you get a bite with the toppings and the DL sauce, you might go back to buy another sandwich before you finish the one in your hand. As the chicken sandwich was the only item I purchased, I cant comment on the chicken pieces, tenders, or any of the sides. But, to be honest, get the chicken sandwich and youll be a very happy diner. They can have quite a long line-up, so make sure you go with a lot of time to spare if you go during busier hours. Cheers. Check out @foodpharaoh on Instagram for more food!

Ive been told that lots of good things about this place and it actually was!!! Love the chicken tender here and we ordered hot    it was a perfect kick for us. Its not greasy chicken was extra crispy well-seasoned love it

Crispy fried chicken, amazing in house sauces. Pickles were made in house as well. The burgers are a must try. Do get here as early as you can to avoid the long lines. There is seating but for small groups, there are picnic tables outside for groups of 6 or more.
OMG the chicken here is amazing!! Soo juicy!! One of the best chicken thighs and chicken burgers you ll ever have. Although, it is best to take your order to go. Will definitely be coming back soon!

Delicious! It was our first time walking by and not seeing a gigantic lineup, so we decided we try this restaurant. Since there are multiple choices and we did not what to expect, we ordered the first item on the menue, called The Original The fried chicken was covered in a flavorful batter with what I would call  Southern spices, was placed in a burger style bun. The box was filled with first class French fries, also covered with flourverfull spices and last but not least, the food box contained a water bottle. All this for $20. Not cheap, but good. The only thing I would caution about, is the fact that this type of food should be eaten on the spot and should not be shipped for to long, because your bun and your fries will turn eventually soggy. Highly recommended.

Came here on a recommendation from an employee at Storm Brewing he said Best fried chicken in Canada  I am not sure if its the best in Canada, have not been to all them, but they have some dam good fried chicken here. They use chicken thighs and cook themperfectly so that its super juicy nice crispy batter with nice and spicy seasoning to them. Fries are also very good great seasoning crispy with soft interior. I highly recommend.

Amazing chicken burgers!!! cooked to absolute perfection. So many chicken places cook until dry but not here. I personally like the dark meat so I usually sub dark meat insted of white on the burger and its so juicy.   Love all the options.  Definitely dont be shy for the spice because its very real and AMAZING. Todays CHICKEN day!!

The staff were incredible. I have been wanting to enjoy some of there delicious chicken for years but the line is always out the door an down the ally. Lo and behold this morning there was ONE group in line. ONLY ONE. This was my opportunity, my moment to see what all the fuss is about. I was not disappointed. I was greeted by every single staff member in unison when it was made know this was my first visit. Overall the food was tasty and I ll be coming back. Thanks for the great service.

I should have taken a picture of the line because it was looooooooooong! 15 min wait but damn it was worth every minute. Food is fresh, portions are huge, and it s all so delicious. Ready to sleep right after.

Best chicken place Ive been to. Was recommended it by 3 different people who grew up in the area when I asked where to eat when I was visiting Vancouver and it absolutely lived up to the hype. Anytime Im in town Ill do my best to make a trip to get a sandwich here.

Amazing amazing food! The onion rings are heaven  and the chicken is on point. Waited almost an hour and a half for the Tag Team burger on new years Day but is was completely worth it. Everyone working there is super friendly and are having a good time in what they are doing. Going back again and again.

Thank you so much! I ordered on Doordash! Amazing really and kind helpful staff over the phone today! A note on the box that says have a wonderful day! Thanks for making my day wonderful. :) Food : 5/5
